entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 06:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon except minus 9 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon except minus 9 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4 except near minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4 except near minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1 except minus 5 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
